title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP]JAFFA! 潘马斯附属 吃货福利1+1!
author: modpromulgator
txt_content:
本帖最后由 modpromulgator 于 2015-9-9 16:04 编辑 

JAFFA!
Just Another Fun Food Addon!
潘马斯附属!

这个Mod作为潘马斯的附属Mod
增加了40+种让人垂涎欲滴的食物~~
简直就吃货福利啊有木有~~

简介:这个Mod增加了40+种食物！
也算是一个非常给力的潘马斯附属！
JAFFA还加入了一些液体~~
就像酱油或者油之类的~~
潘马斯的话你们都懂的~~
吃货必备~~
物品一览表(一部分):
1.柠檬酸(Citric Acid)
2.Supreme披萨片(Supreme Pizza Slice)
3.披萨片(Pizza Slice)
4.煮豆子配吐司(Baked Bean On Toast)
5.宴会肉披萨片(Meat Feast Pizza Slices)
6.CaptainSparklez披萨片(CaptainSparklez)(貌似是Youtube上某实况主~~)
7.香蕉奶昔,香草奶昔,巧克力奶昔,草莓奶昔(Banana,Vanilla,Chocolate,Strawberry MilkShake)
8.法式蜗牛(Escargot)
9.培根和蛋(Bacon And Eggs)
10.咸味薯片(Salt Chips)
11.咸醋味薯片(Salt Vinegar Salt Chips)
12.酸奶油香葱薯片(Sour Cream and Chives Creams Chip)
13.巧克力饼干片(Chocolate Chips Cookie)
14.柠檬和糖薄饼,果酱薄饼,蜂蜜薄饼(Lemon And Sugar,Jam,Honey PanCakes)
15.香蕉松饼,香薄荷松饼,巧克力松饼(Banana,Savory,Chocolate Muffin)
16.芝士牛排派,蔬菜鸡肉派,培根鸡蛋派,鱼肉派(Cheese And Steak,Chicken Pie With Vegetables,Bacon And Egg, Fish Pie)
17.鱼肉Keish(Fish Keish)
18.芝士通心粉(Cheese Macaroni)
19.土豆顶鱼派(Potato Top Fish Pie)
20.鸡排(Roasted Chicken)
这只是一半左右的食物~~
有时间的话我可能会把所有食物写上去~~
特别提示:看到那个彩色培根了么~~那就是极限培根(Extreme Bacon)~~瞬间回满饱食度 还有两分钟的伤害吸收效果~~造价当然也不便宜~~有两种制作方法~~一种是8个钻石一个培根~~另一种是4个金块一个培根~~

ChangeLog:
[size=11.666666030883789px]Added Ice Cream (Fluid) 
Added Cream (Fluid)
Added Mustard (Fluid)
Added Oil (Fluid)
Added Vinegar (Fluid)
Added Stock (Fluid)
Added Extreme Bacon!
Added Jelly Burger
Added Shrimp Tempura
Added Philly Cheesesteak
Added Doritos
Added Mountain Dew
Added Coca-Cola
Added Pepsi
Added Dr Pepper
Added Coca-Cola Float

Fixed Bug Causing Mayo To Disappear In Salads

Changed Fish Salad to Tuna Salad
Changed Tuna Salad recipe to require Tuna
Changed Tuna Salad so that it can also be made with vanilla fish
(In the case that you turn off all HarvestCraft fish in config)


[size=11.666666030883789px]如果你喜欢这个Mod 请不要忘记打分给人气~~
[size=11.666666030883789px]你们的支持就是我最大的动力 谢谢~~[size=11.666666030883789px]
[size=11.666666030883789px]百度网盘地址:http://pan.baidu.com/s/1qWBqwlm
